content: The cost of laser teeth whitening can vary depending on factors such as the dentist's location, the type of laser used, the extent of the treatment needed, and other factors. On average, laser teeth whitening can range from $500-$1,500. Some dental insurance plans may cover the cost of teeth whitening treatments, but it varies depending on your specific plan and coverage. Generally, cosmetic dental procedures such as teeth whitening are considered elective and may not be covered by insurance. It's important to check with your dental insurance provider to see if they offer coverage for teeth whitening treatments. If not, some dental offices may offer financing or payment plans to help make the treatment more affordable. It's best to consult with the dentist to discuss the cost and financing options.
